text: Fabian Lukas Schär (born 20 December 1991) is a Swiss football player. He plays as a centre-back for Newcastle United and the Switzerland national team. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Olympians for Switzerland Category:Association football defenders Category:Newcastle United F.C. players Category:Bundesliga players Category:Premier League players Category:Footballers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from the canton of St. Gallen
title: Fabian Schär
